alert.note: Alert for Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley; Western Columbia River Gorge (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 05 at 12:25AM PST until December 05 at 6:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM PST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. Ice accumulations of one tenth of an inch or less. * WHERE...Hood River Valley and Central Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 6 AM PST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow has mostly transitioned to freezing drizzle, with much of the area expected to receive a light glaze of ice overnight.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Central Columbia River Gorge; Upper Hood River Valley; Western Columbia River Gorge
